snippet: As NATO refocuses on its eastern borders after Russia's annexation of Crimea, the United States is quietly deploying more troops to train special forces in former Soviet bloc states anxious about Moscow's intentions....

headline.print_headline: After Ukraine, U.S. Trains More Special Forces in Eastern Europe
headline.main: After Ukraine, U.S. Trains More Special Forces in Eastern Europe

lead_paragraph: As NATO refocuses on its eastern borders after Russia's annexation of Crimea, the United States is quietly deploying more troops to train special forces in former Soviet bloc states anxious about Moscow's intentions.
